parameters.name: AliyunOrderId
parameters.description: The Alibaba Cloud order ID (including the virtual order ID).

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the activation code.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the activation code. The name can contain only letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). The activation code file downloaded from the console is named based on this name.

parameters.name: SystemIdentifier
parameters.description: The system identifier of the database. This parameter is required if you set AllowEmptySystemIdentifier to false.
